contacts.name: Evoccultic Disciple
contacts.signature: Life will find its own exit

145000000.text: This message is automatically sent by the system

145000001.text: If you see this message on the teleslate, then congratulations: You have cleared the initial test for the enigmatic Ceremony I named "Golden Scapegoat." You might be already used to the various mysterious phenomena you have encountered in Amphoreus. Just like the test you just completed. That thing appeared during the Era Bellica period. It was seen as an ill omen and caused many uproars in the world. But as time went on, people gradually learned to ignore it.

145000002.text: But if you're like me and wish to discover what secrets lay beneath these goat masks, whether there are powers beyond the Titans dominating our world, and what this world's secrets are according to Evoccultism's teachings... Then, I recommend that you study the "Golden Scapegoat" alongside me and uncover these grand mysteries lost to the people of this world.

145000003.text: When you pass more challenges, you can find out how to contact me through the teleslate.

145000004.text: The goat head is pretty interesting. Don't keep me in suspense. Let's meet up.

145000005.text: Don't waste your data. I'm not your target audience

145000006.text: What is Evoccultism? A kind of biological evolution?

145000007.text: This message is automatically sent by the system

145000008.text: When you pass more challenges, you can find out how to contact me through the teleslate.

145000009.text: Tsk. I don't actually want to repeat everything, but this cursed teleslate is too limited in function. (Well, maybe I just don't know how to use it?) I can't manage to make it automatically message me when you finish the challenge.

145000010.text: So, I set a variable first. (Please forgive me, it cannot be 1, but I promise it's not bigger than 5.) When you finish your challenges at a few different spots, your teleslate will receive my personal information. This way, you can contact me in reality (if you wish).

145000011.text: Sigh, dear friend. It's a shame that these teleslates aren't as good as seances (a pity I cannot perform such a thing, as I am not a priest). Such troublesome matters cannot be blamed on me...

145000012.text: I hope we can uncover the secret behind the Golden Scapegoat!

145000013.text: Reserved service has concluded. Transmission automatically concluded
